content:
%%{init: {
  "theme": "base",
  "themeVariables": {
    "primaryColor": "#e3f2fd",
    "primaryTextColor": "#0d47a1",
    "primaryBorderColor": "#2196f3",
    "lineColor": "#546e7a",
    "fontSize": "14px",
    "tertiaryColor": "#f5f5f5"
  },
  "flowchart": { "curve": "basis", "htmlLabels": true, "useMaxWidth": true }
}}%%

graph LR
    %% 开始节点
    Start["开始"] --> Order["接单"]
    %% 接单后处理
    Order --> Accept["确认接单"]
    Accept --> Navigate["导航至订单地点"]
    %% 骑手到达地点
    Navigate --> Arrive["到达订单地点"]
    Arrive --> PickUp["取餐"]
    %% 取餐后处理
    PickUp --> Deliver["配送中"]
    Deliver --> AtDelivery["到达收餐地点"]
    AtDelivery --> HandOver["交接订单"]
    HandOver --> End["结束"]
    
    %% 异常路径
    AtDelivery -.-> Return["返回取餐点"]
    Return --> PickUp
    HandOver -.-> Cancel["取消订单"]
    Cancel --> End
    
    %% 子图 - 配送路径
    subgraph main["主流程"]
      Start --> Order
      Order --> Accept
      Accept --> Navigate
      Navigate --> Arrive
      Arrive --> PickUp
      PickUp --> Deliver
      Deliver --> AtDelivery
      AtDelivery --> HandOver
      HandOver --> End
    end
    
    %% 子图 - 异常处理
    subgraph exceptions["异常处理"]
      AtDelivery -.-> Return
      Return --> PickUp
      HandOver -.-> Cancel
      Cancel --> End
    end
